title: The Way I Are (feat. Keri Hilson & D.O.E.)
author: Timbaland
lyrics:
[00:12.26] Yeah!... yeah!... remember the time, baby... yeah!
[00:17.95] 
[00:25.12] I ain't got no money
[00:28.25] I ain't got no car to take you on a date
[00:32.73] I can't even buy you flowers
[00:36.73] But together we'd be the perfect soulmates
[00:41.34] Talk to me girl
[00:43.00] (Oh) Baby, it's alright now, you ain't gotta flaunt for me
[00:47.40] If we go and touch, you can still touch my love, it's free
[00:51.71] We can work without the perks just you and me
[00:55.82] Work it out 'til we get it right
[00:58.63] Baby if you strip, you can get a tip
[01:00.89] 'Cause I like you just the way you are
[01:03.68] (I'm about to strip and I'm well equipped
[01:05.27] Can you handle me the way I'm on?)
[01:07.55] I don't need the G's or the car keys
[01:09.40] Boy I like you just the way you are
[01:11.84] Let me see ya strip, you can get a tip
[01:13.54] 'Cause I like, I like, I like...
[01:15.26] I ain't got no Visa
[01:18.29] I ain't got no Red American Express
[01:22.78] We can't go nowhere exotic
[01:26.40] It don't matter 'cause I'm the one that loves you best
[01:31.09] Talk to me girl
[01:33.16] Oh, baby, it's alright now, you ain't gotta flaunt for me
[01:37.44] If we go and touch, you can still touch my love, it's free
[01:41.99] We can work without the perks just you and me
[01:45.89] Work it out 'til we get it right
[01:49.43] Baby if you strip, you can get a tip
[01:51.20] 'Cause I like you just the way you are
[01:53.56] (I'm about to strip and I'm well equipped
[01:55.29] Can you handle me the way I'm on?)
[01:57.87] I don't need the G's or the car keys
[01:59.59] Boy I like you just the way you are
[02:01.94] Let me see ya strip, you can get a tip
[02:03.50] 'Cause I like you just the way you are
[02:06.21] Baby girl, I don't got a huge ol' house I rent a room in a house
[02:10.30] Listen baby girl, I ain't got a motorboat but I can float ya boat
[02:14.11] So listen baby girl, once you get a dose of D.O.E. you gon' want some mo'
[02:18.52] So listen baby girl, when I make it I want you there, want you there, yeah.
[02:22.90] Yeah my money and me loof like feel me them,
[02:24.93] And it's realy not quite Louis Allason,
[02:26.95] Your body ain't Pamela Anderson,
[02:29.00] Its a struggle just to get you in the caravan,
[02:30.93] But listen baby girl,
[02:32.82] Before I let you lose a pound I'll buy a bigger car,
[02:35.35] So listen baby girl,
[02:37.13] I love you just the way you are, the way you are
[02:39.86] Oh, baby, it's alright now, you ain't gotta floss for me
[02:44.40] If we go and touch, you can still touch my love, it's free
[02:48.79] We can work without the perks just you and me
[02:52.85] Thug it out 'til we get it right
[02:56.18] Baby if you strip, you can get a tip
[02:58.19] 'Cause I like you just the way you are
[03:00.75] (I'm about to strip and I want it quick
[03:02.84] Can you handle me the way I are?)
[03:04.84] I don't need the cheese or the car keys
[03:07.04] Boy I like you just the way you are
[03:09.14] Let me see ya strip, you can get a tip
[03:10.98] 'Cause I like you just the way you are
[03:13.34] Baby if you strip, you can get a tip
[03:15.31] 'Cause I like you just the way you are
[03:17.57] (I'm about to strip and I want it quick
[03:19.52] Can you handle me the way I are?)
[03:21.82] I don't need the cheese or the car keys
[03:23.84] Boy I like you just the way you are
[03:25.86] Let me see ya strip, you can get a tip
[03:27.97] 'Cause I like, I like, I like...
[03:29.59]
